title: How to Make a Game Pass for Your Game on Roblox

steps.title: Click the game (yours) that you want a game pass on.
steps.content: Click the game (yours) that you want a game pass on.

steps.title: Look at the game passes.
steps.content: Look at the game passes. It will say "Add pass." Click that.

steps.title: Click "Choose file".
steps.content: Click "Choose file". This will allow you to choose what the pass looks like.

steps.title: Add details if desired.
steps.content: Add details if desired. If this does something specific, like allowing you to meet the creator, type it in the description. You can also name your pass if you want.

steps.title: Look at your pass and click "Configure."
steps.content: Look at your pass and click "Configure."

steps.title: Sell it for as much as you like.
steps.content: Sell it for as much as you like. You can edit a few things. To sell it, check the box that says "Sell this item."

steps.title: Go to your game and check your pass.
steps.content: Go to your game and check your pass. See if that's the way you want it. You have made a game pass!
